pr_title: Add the ability to define maven repositories when creating a project

timeline.author: gastaldi

timeline.message:
Devtools: Add the ability to define maven repositories when creating a project

Fixes #9588

Update devtools-common test templates

Use the content from the actual templates: /devtools/platform-descriptor-json/src/main/resources/templates
